definition: The north wind is icy cold.

sentences.english: The north wind howled around our cabin.
sentences.chinese: 朔風在我們小屋周圍怒號。

sentences.english: Independentwinter, north wind blows, lonely Star.
sentences.chinese: 獨立寒冬，朔風蕭瑟，寂寞星空。

sentences.english: Since a nation even couldn't bear to hear them, they naturally died out in the boreas .
sentences.chinese: 既然一個民族都不忍聽聞，它們也就消失在朔風之中。

sentences.english: As the north wind to the clouds.
Since a nation can not bear to hear, they will disappear in the boreas .
sentences.chinese: 既然一個民族都不忍聽聞，它們也就消失在朔風之中。

definition: infantile convulsion (illness affecting children esp. under the age of five, marked by muscular spasms)
soughing/whistling or rushing sound (of the wind in trees, the sea etc)
border fort, esp. defending narrow valley
Lianyun district of Lianyungang city 連雲港市|连云港市[Lian2 yun2 gang3 shi4], Jiangsu
(literary) crisscross/uneven/disorderly/rim of the eye/variant of 欄杆|栏杆[lan2 gan1]
Baqiao District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
in large numbers/in force/lit. clouds bubbling up
